name: Mari Boine
description: Sami singer Mari Boine performs at the Philharmonie's Kammermusiksaal. Boine is a pioneering artist who has brought Sami joik traditions into dialogue with jazz, folk, and world music, creating a unique sonic universe that transcends cultural boundaries. Her work carries both spiritual depth and political resonance, making her a vital voice in indigenous music and a figure whose art speaks to decolonial futures.
